data.oai_dc:dc: Virulence profiles of Melampsora larici-populina in France from 1992 to 2011

Virulence types of Melampsora larici-populina sampled in France from 1992 to 2011. Isolates were inoculated on a differential set of eight poplar cultivars, each bearing a single qualitative resistance, to determine which virulence type(s) they possessed. In total 6494 isolates from 44 samples have been phenotyped. Columns labels are detailed in the Read Me file
Gene for gene interaction|Parasite|Temporal sampling|Poplar rust|Virulence
